data.quote: The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: Never think there is anything impossible for the soul. It is the greatest heresy to think so. If there is sin, this is the only sin; to say that you are weak, or others are weak.
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: Arise! Awake! And Stop not till the goal is reached!
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: As different streams having different sources all mingle their waters in the sea, so different tendencies, various though they appear, crooked or straight, all lead to God.
data.author: Swami Vivekananda

data.quote: Integrity is doing the right thing, even if nobody is watching.
data.author: Jim Stovall

data.quote: In the end, a person is only known by the impact he or she has on others.
data.author: Jim Stovall

data.quote: A journey may be long or short, but it must start at the very spot one finds oneself.
data.author: Jim Stovall

data.quote: Money is nothing more than a tool. It can be a force for good, a force for evil, or simple be idle.
data.author: Jim Stovall

data.quote: It is a wealthy person, indeed, who calculates riches not in gold but in friends.
data.author: Jim Stovall

data.quote: Education is a lifelong journey whose destination expands as you travel. The desire and hunger for education is the key to real learning.
data.author: Jim Stovall

data.quote: Problems can only be avoided by exercising good judgment. Good judgment can only be gained by experiencing life's problems.
data.author: Jim Stovall

data.quote: Faith is all that dreamers need to see into the future.
data.author: Jim Stovall

data.quote: Life at its essence boils down to one day at a time. Today is the Day! If we can learn how to live one day to its fullest, our lives will be rich and meaningful.
data.author: Jim Stovall

data.quote: Love is a treasure for which we can never pay. The only way we keep it is to give it away.
data.author: Jim Stovall
